channel.title: [req] adding animation to models
channel.description:
i gues potato or something released it hwo to add animation to your models so your items move
anyone know where the topic is ?? thanx
Crezzur

item.title: [req] adding animation to models
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Dragmagic put it on his site - it’s in his siggy.

http://dragon-scape.co.cc

What I do is look at the cache models using datmaker to see what PRI: TSKIN: and VSKIN1: values are needed for which parts whilst i’m adding the data in metasequoia. ie I cheat.
Read the site - explains that you can also use VSKIN2: and VSKIN3: for vertex skins above 100.

Read full topic
